buttons.error: Failed to send the message because
buttons.help: Send this email to the site administrators

levels.name: entrance
levels.tip: Start here if you are new to this site

messages.name: changeSkinAltTip
messages.text: Change the current skin to this alternative

messages.name: changeSkinDefaultTip
messages.text: Change the current skin back to the system default

messages.name: contextHelpTip
messages.text: Provides help text on this page

messages.name: dateWidgetTip
messages.text: Click the calendar icon to open a date selection window

messages.name: debugToggleTip
messages.text: Debug mode generates more output in the log files

messages.name: eBadSecurityCode
messages.text: the security code did not match the one displayed on the form

messages.name: eBadToken
messages.text: the CSRF form token does not match the one that was expected

messages.name: eContentNotFound
messages.text: cannot find a Content-Type supported by your client

messages.name: eLoginFailure
messages.text: the login id ([% arg1 %]) and password were not recognised

messages.name: eMandatory
messages.text: the [% arg1 %] field must have a value

messages.name: eNameToShort
messages.text: failed to generate a new user id. The user name [% arg1 %] is too short. Minimum [% arg2 %] characters

messages.name: eNoACL
messages.text: no list of allowed users/groups for [% arg1 %]

messages.name: eNoActions
messages.text: no actions have been associated with the [% arg1 %] button

messages.name: eNoCheckfield
messages.text: the field [% arg1 %] does not define a validation subroutine

messages.name: eNoPage
messages.text: There is no [% arg1 %] page definition

messages.name: eNotImplemented
messages.text: method for [% arg2 %] not implemented by [% arg1 %]

messages.name: eNothingUpdated
messages.text: no fields on this form changed

messages.name: eSerializeFailed
messages.text: Content-Type [% arg1 %] had a problem with your request

messages.name: eUnknownForward
messages.text: an unknown error occured whilst forwarding to [% arg1 %]

messages.name: eValidIdentifier
messages.text: field [% arg1 %] value [% arg2 %] is not a vaild identifier

messages.name: eValidInteger
messages.text: field [% arg1 %] value [% arg2 %] is not a vaild integer

messages.name: eValidPassword
messages.text: field [% arg1 %] value [% arg2 %] is not a valid password

messages.name: exitTip
messages.text: Exit the application and reset your identity to unknown

messages.name: feedbackOptionTip
messages.text: Share your experiences of this site with its administrators

messages.name: feedbackTip
messages.text: Share your surfing experience of this web site with its developers and administrators

messages.name: fieldPromptWidthTip
messages.text: Decrease/Increase the size of the field prompts on forms

messages.name: footerToggleTip
messages.text: Toggle the display state of the footer bar

messages.name: isValidIdentifier
messages.text: Field value contains illegal characters or is null

messages.name: isValidInteger
messages.text: Field value is not a valid integer or is not in the required range

messages.name: isValidPassword
messages.text: Field value is not a valid password

messages.name: levelVersion
messages.text: The version number of the [% level %] controller

messages.name: logoTip
messages.text: Go to this servers home page

messages.name: moduleVersion
messages.text: The version number of the [% application %] application

messages.name: overview
messages.text:
This side bar uses an accordion widget and Ajax to manage it's content. Click on each title bar to expand the panel and load the content.



Validate

messages.name: pageGenerated
messages.text: Date and time this page was generated

messages.name: search_results
messages.text: Displaying page [% current_page %] of [% total_pages %] containing [% entries_this_page %] of [% total_entries %] total hits.

messages.name: sideBarTip
messages.text: Menu Bar ~ Navigate around the rooms on this level using the links on this menu bar. Clicking this bullet expands/collapses the side bar display panel
